value.title: KT to invest $41 million into Hyundai Robotics
value.excerpt: South Korean telco KT will invest 50 billion won ($41.4 million) into Hyundai Robotics for a 10% stake, the company said on Tuesday. The two companies will collaborate to co-develop intelligent service robots and perform research in the areas of automation and smart factories,
